name: schoolLife 东洋中学之异闻录
name_original: schoolLife 东洋中学之异闻录
description:
This game recorded my school life, the second time I made the game, it was not very good. Playing this game, you will experience Guo Zhiyuan's helplessness in doing all kinds of bizarre behaviors, the last roar of a depressed patient, the player interacts with objects or people by walking around, thereby promoting the development of the plot, this game can be said to be a galgame without love elements, or it can be said that a junior high school student recalls his school life boring work. This game has many built-in mini-games, so that everyone will not be so bored when playing, such as finding an examination room, writing essays and so on.
Operating instructions:
WASD mobile
R interaction (this key can be pressed when a red exclamation mark appears above the character's head) / Get up from the chair
Press R to interact
Z Continue Conversation/Skip Video/Turn off Right Shift setting
HOME Archive (silent)
Right SHIFT settings
